I call it the ham gene.
It's from the womb.
I loved to perform.
And my mom would go to Woolworth's and she would inevitably go to the sewing department.

And I knew pretty much every song ever made because my dad played music all the time in the house.
So I knew all kinds of music.
And I would begin to perform with whatever the Muzak was.

Just a ham.
